Breeding adult.description: Least Grebes are smaller with thinner bills than Pied-billed Grebes, which have a thick and stubby bill. Least Grebes have yellow eyes while Pied-billed Grebes have a dark eye.

Nonbreeding.description: Horned Grebes have a thinner bill than Pied-billed Grebes. Nonbreeding Horned Grebes have white on the chest and face whereas Pied-billed Grebes are brownish overall without white patches.

Nonbreeding Eared Grebes have a white patch on the back of the head and a whitish neck whereas Pied-billed Grebes are brownish overall and lack white patches. Note bill size differences; thin on Eared and stubby on Pied-billed.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Green-winged Teals have flatter, longer bills and bigger heads than Pied-billed Grebes.
